tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE scorecard_ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    delivery_performance FLOAT NOT NULL,
    product_quality FLOAT NOT NULL,
    communication_skills FLOAT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_vendor_id FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id)
        REFERENCES vendor_scorecard(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name STRING,
    location STRING,
    contact_name STRING,
    contact_email STRING
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name STRING,
    supplier_id INT,
    price DECIMAL,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    year  INT,
    score FLOAT,
    comments STRING
);

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  product_description TEXT,
  vendor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  purchase_quantity INT,
  purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  review_rating FLOAT,
  review_comment TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE scores (
  score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_id INT,
  score_date DATE,
  score_value FLOAT,
  score_comment TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);
